definition: abbr. for Heilongjiang province 黑龍江|黑龙江[Hei1 long2 jiang1]
abbr. for Canada 加拿大[Jia1 na2 da4]/surname Jia

to add/plus/(used after an adverb such as 不, 大, 稍 etc, and before a disyllabic verb, to indicate that the action of the verb is applied to sth or sb previously mentioned)/to apply (restrictions etc) to (sb)/to give (support, consideration etc) to (sth)

sentences.english: This Shiraz is loaded with dark juicy black currant aromas.
sentences.chinese: 这西拉充满了多汁的黑加仑香气。

sentences.english: Among them was cassis, a black currant dessert wine.
sentences.chinese: 桌上摆放着黑醋栗，一种黑加仑甜酒。

sentences.english: He started to use them in sauces and tarts.
sentences.chinese: 于是奎因开始用黑加仑调制酱汁，制作果馅糕点。

sentences.english: Papaya cream is a nice final touch for any hearty meal.
sentences.chinese: 木瓜奶昔配黑加仑力娇酒是饱餐后的完美点缀。

sentences.english: Structure, the abundant fine grain tannins and balanced acidity contribute to a long finish characterised by lingering blackcurrant flavours.
sentences.chinese: 单宁结构层次丰富而平衡，有持久释放的黑加仑子味。

sentences.english: An explosive nose of wild strawberry, blackcurrant and fresh roses.
sentences.chinese: 扑鼻而来的野生草莓，黑加仑和新鲜玫瑰的香气。

sentences.english: Schwarze Johannisbeeren they were called in German—black currants in English.
sentences.chinese: 在德国，它们被称为赛威兹醋栗，即英语中的黑加仑。

sentences.english: Pale yellow oily liquid, The peculiar smell with black currants, Taste of soft.
sentences.chinese: 浅黄色油状液体，具有黑加仑特有的气味，滋味柔和。

definition: aromatic herb/vanilla/alternative name for Eupatorium fortunei/(fig.) loyal and dependable person (old)
